question: The 13th India-Japan Foreign Ministers’ Strategic Dialogue was conducted in which city?
explanation:
Union External Affairs Minister of India Dr S. Jaishankar held 13th India-Japan Foreign Ministers’ Strategic Dialogue with his Japanese counterpart, Mr MOTEGI Toshimitsu in Tokyo.
They reviewed the mutual partnerships in various sectors including maritime security, trade and investment, manufacturing and skill development. They also affirmed to conduct the next Annual Bilateral Summit in India.
